meanings.definition: A person who is unkind or cruel.
meanings.sent1: The meanie wouldn't share their toys with the other kids.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a meanie and say hurtful things to others.
meanings.sent3: The meanie always hides the best snacks from everyone else.
meanings.sent4: Her boss was a real meanie, always criticizing her work.
meanings.sent5: The playground meanie made everyone feel sad with their mean words.

meanings.definition: A mean or unkind action or behavior.
meanings.sent1: His refusal to help was a real meanie move.
meanings.sent2: Ignoring someone's feelings is a classic example of a meanie.
meanings.sent3: The meanie of the story was the character who stole all the cookies.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds were like a meanie blocking out the sun's warmth.
meanings.sent5: The meanie of the group always ruins the fun for everyone else.
